messages.title: Standing with Theresa May
messages.content: Local people are backing Neil Carmichael and Theresa May.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Neil has been incredibly supportive of the UK's learning centre of excellence based here in Stroud. His work on helping to improve our educational programme should be recognised.
For the past seven years Neil Carmichael has been working tirelessly for local businesses and was able to deliver brand new investment, jobs, and training. His support has been invaluable.
Neil ensured the right connections to enable help during anxious times, while abroad, resulting in ease for obtaining passports and successful visa applications.
Neil's road work and effective action to deal with the consequences of the flooding on the B4063 is an unbelievable gesture to his community.

issues.education: Neil has been incredibly supportive of the UK's learning centre of excellence based here in Stroud. His work on helping to improve our educational programme should be recognised.
issues.health: Neil helped by ensuring my challenging communication task whilst abroad went smoothly, resulting in our securing passports, and the overall process relaxed any tension around visa applications.
issues.transport: The road will soon be properly reinstated.

community.content: Neil's help meant that Olly's SEN support was transferred into the realm of schools. We can now rest knowing that Olly's needs are being met, thanks to Neil's proactive approach and endurance through the process.

endorsements.endorsement: Neil has been incredibly supportive of the UK's learning centre of excellence based here in Stroud. His work on helping to improve our educational programme should be recognised.

Neil's help meant that Olly's SEN support was transferred into the realm of schools. We can now rest knowing that Olly's needs are being met, thanks to Neil's proactive approach and endurance through the process.
Neil's involvement saw a new immediate resolution enabling me to secure work as a consultant engineer.
Neil helped by ensuring my challenging communication task whilst abroad, resulting in securing passports, and the overall process relaxed any tension around visa applications.
Neil's road work and effective action to deal with the consequences of the flooding on the B4063 is an unbelievable gesture to his community.

personalStories.story: Nikki and Ollie Adcock shared how Neil's help meant that their son Olly's SEN support was transferred into the realm of schools, ensuring his needs were met.
